entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
